grammar.english: Basic comparison (A is more [adj] than B)

grammar.pattern: A + 没有 + B + [这么/那么] + Adj
grammar.english: Negative comparison (A is not as [adj] as B)
Progressive aspect (Action in progress right now)
Continuous state (Action is ongoing or state is maintained)

grammar.example: 十多个人 / 五点左右。
虽然天气不好，但是他还是去了。
因为他生病了，所以没去上班。
他八点就来了。/ 他九点才来。

grammar.english: Complement of state (Evaluating how an action is done)

grammar.pattern: 可能 / 能够 / 可以

grammar.english: Result complements (Finish / Finish well / Do wrongly)

topics.label: Advanced Personal Info
topics.description: Describing physical appearance (height, eyes, hair) and character traits.

topics.label: Daily Routines & Habits
topics.description: Waking up, hygiene, exercise habits, and work schedules.

topics.label: Health & Body
topics.description: Parts of the body, describing illnesses (fever, cough), and visiting the doctor.

topics.label: Shopping & Public Services
topics.description: Buying clothes/groceries, weights and measures (kilograms), and asking for help in banks or shops.

topics.label: Travel & Directions
topics.description: Booking tickets, modes of transport (bus, boat, bike), and navigating using left/right/straight.

topics.label: Work & Study Life
topics.description: Office tasks, school subjects, exams, and colleague relationships.

topics.label: Weather & Nature
topics.description: Seasons, specific weather (snow, cloudy, clear), and simple geographical descriptions.

topics.label: Socializing & Hobbies
topics.description: Making plans with friends, hobbies (singing, dancing, sports), and attending parties.
